name: OM The Word
description:
In the beginning was the word,
and the word was OM. 

This game is about creation, pursuit, and resistance. 
Be born from nothing — illuminate the dark. 

  • Yulia Maximluk - Unity Developer
  • Marina Vasylieva - 2D Artist
  • Daniil Krylov - Game Designer
  • Anna Balakhnina - Project Manager

Sound ON, please.
